person.name: Gregory A. Schwitzer
person.description: Elder Gregory A. Schwitzer was sustained a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 4, 2009, at age 61. Elder Schwitzer spent the first three years of his assignment serving as Area President of the Europe East Area. He currently serves as an assistant Executive Director in the Temple Department.
